metadata.home: Fast Scans - Read Free English Comics Daily - New Comics Updated Every Day
metadata.home_description: Discover a vast collection of free, up-to-date English comics across diverse genres including fantasy, martial arts, teen, romance, and more on Fast Scans. Read the latest releases daily without any cost.
metadata.search_description: Explore a Wide Range of Latest Online Comic Series for Free at Fast Scans. Stay Updated with Continuous Releases, Never Run Out of Engaging Stories!
metadata.top_description: Explore the hottest comic rankings at Fast Scans. Which comics are currently the most beloved? Regularly updated based on reader ratings.
metadata.upgrade_account: Upgrade your account to bring an even better experience | Fast Scans
metadata.upgrade_account_description: Upgrade your Fast Scans account to unlock even more fantastic comic reading features. Enjoy ad-free reading and numerous enticing offers awaiting you!
metadata.detail_package: Details of PREMIUM Upgrade Package | Fast Scans
metadata.detail_package_description: Explore the details of the PREMIUM upgrade package at Fast Scans. Unlock many enticing features exclusively for PREMIUM members.
metadata.following_description: Never miss any new comic chapters with the Follow feature at Fast Scans. Stay updated promptly on new chapters of your favorite comics, keeping you ahead of the crowd.
metadata.login: Login with Google Account | Fast Scans
metadata.login_description: Discover the wonderful world of comics at Fast Scans. Log in with your Google account to experience enhanced comic reading features.
metadata.profile_description: Personal information, level status, follow list, reading history, and many other features to personalize your comic reading experience!
metadata.comic_description: {title} - Latest {lastedChapter} English Version, High-Quality Images Updated Daily on Fast Scans
metadata.content_description: Read {comicTitle} {contentTile} English Version, High-Quality Images Updated Daily on Fast Scans
metadata.top_user_description: The User Power Rankings on Fast Scans is where you can track and compare the strength and activities of the comic reading community. Discover who's leading and join the race to become the most powerful user!
metadata.payment: Upgrade to Premium Account Payment | Fast Scans
metadata.payment_description: Upgrade to a Premium account payment on Fast Scans to experience unlimited access to the comic world. No ads, daily updates of new comics, and many exclusive offers await you!
metadata.schedule_description: Weekly story release schedule for Premium members
metadata.maintenance_desctipion: Sorry for the inconvenience! We are currently performing system maintenance on Fast Scans. We will be back up and running soon.
metadata.install: Comic reading web application for iOS and Android | Fast Scans
metadata.install_description: Install the Fast Scans web application for iOS and Android for quicker access, smoother experience, notifications for new chapters, and exclusive features for Premium members.

footer.info: Fast Scans - Free online comic book store | Good comics. New comics. The website always updates the latest series of unique genres such as fairy tales, swordplay, teen stories, and the best love novels and completely free of charge.

upgrade.benefit_1: Equipped with vibrant RGB colors for username and related pages
upgrade.benefit_2: Access to a dedicated premium server, more stable than regular users
upgrade.benefit_3: Early access to the latest chapters by 14 hours compared to regular users
upgrade.benefit_4: Receive notifications via email for updates on new chapters of followed comics
upgrade.benefit_5: Increase comment limit to a maximum of 20 times/day
upgrade.benefit_6: Participate in the lucky spin 3 times/day
upgrade.benefit_8: Ability to post/comment on discussion posts on fast-blog
upgrade.benefit_10: Equipped with deep RGB colors for username and related pages
upgrade.benefit_11: Early access to the latest chapters by 10 hours compared to regular users, and 4 hours later than [S]Premium
upgrade.benefit_12: Increase comment limit to a maximum of 10 times/day
upgrade.benefit_13: Participate in the lucky spin 2 times/day
upgrade.benefit_14: Shopee Ad tab appearance rate is 3% (compared to 13% for regular users)
upgrade.benefit_15: Ability to comment on discussion posts on fast-blog
upgrade.note_1: When scanning the QR code and completing the transaction, please enter the completed transaction code in the field above and press the send button.
upgrade.note_2: Transactions will be processed within 10 minutes (1:30 to 15:59 every day - Coordinated Universal Time).
upgrade.note_3: If the transaction is outside the above time, it will be processed the next day.
upgrade.note_4: If the transaction is not processed within more than 10 minutes, please contact the fanpage for support:
upgrade.note_5: After payment, please wait 5 minutes then log out and log in again

install.title: Install Web App iOS and Android Exclusively for [Premium] Members
install.description: An application that facilitates quicker access, smoother experience, notifies users of new chapters for followed comics (Supports iOS 16.4 and Android 9.0 or above). For optimized experience, please use Safari (iOS) or Chrome (Android) browsers to access the link.
install.step_ios_1: Step 1: After the web page has finished loading, tap on the share icon.
install.step_ios_2: Step 2: Next, tap on the Add to Home screen.
install.step_ios_3: Step 3: When the information is displayed as shown in the image, tap on the Add button.
install.step_ios_4: Step 4: iOS will automatically return to the home screen and add the app icon to it.
install.step_android_1: Step 1: After the web page has finished loading, tap on the Menu icon.
install.step_android_2: Step 2: Next, tap on the Install app option.
install.step_android_3: Step 3: When the information is displayed as shown in the image, tap on the Install button.
install.step_android_4: Step 4: Android will add the app icon to the home screen.
install.faq_answer_1: A web application is an application accessed through a web browser such as Safari on iOS or Chrome on Android. It allows you to experience like a mobile app without the need for separate installation.
install.faq_question_2: Why should I use a web application instead of accessing the website directly?
install.faq_answer_2: Web applications provide a faster, smoother, and more convenient experience by being able to add app icons directly to the home screen of your phone. Additionally, you will receive push notifications when new content is updated, helping you stay up-to-date with the latest updates.
install.faq_question_3: Device requirements and versions for using the web application
install.faq_answer_3: Use a mobile device with iOS 11.3 or Android 4.4 and above. To experience the web application optimally, use popular web browsers and update to the latest versions such as Safari (iOS) or Chrome (Android). High-speed internet connection (3G/4G/5G or WiFi) is required. Push notification feature will require iOS 16.4 and above to function.
install.faq_question_4: What features does Fastscans application have?
install.faq_answer_4: Fastscans application offers features and a user interface similar to the website, but with a faster experience thanks to cache storage. Additionally, you can also receive push notifications for new content and access quickly by adding the app icon to the home screen.
install.faq_question_5: Do I need to register or pay to use the Fastscans application?
install.faq_answer_5: The Fastscans application is one of the privileges reserved for users who subscribe to the Premium or SPremium package. To use this application, you need to subscribe to one of the two subscription packages on our website.
install.faq_question_6: Is the Fastscans application heavy? How much storage space will it occupy on my phone?
install.faq_answer_6: The Fastscans application is very light, only about 400KB. It will not occupy much storage space on your phone.
install.faq_question_7: Can I use the Fastscans application on both iOS and Android?
install.faq_answer_7: Yes, you can use the Fastscans application on both iOS and Android operating systems. For optimal experience, we recommend using Safari browser on iOS or Chrome on Android.
